Module jGame
Package jGame.core.launcher

Class GameLauncher.UIHudPauseMenuElement

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.ui.hud.UIHudElement
jGame.core.launcher.GameLauncher.UIHudPauseMenuElement
Enclosing class:
GameLauncher
public static class GameLauncher.UIHudPauseMenuElement
extends UIHudElement
Represents the pause menu that appears when the user pauses the game.
Since:
1.2.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira
